title: “Ukraine has a nuclear bomb primed in Mykolaiv.”
Western powers have warned that Russia will use the claim that Ukraine is planning to use a "dirty bomb" on its own soil as a pretext for escalating the war.
Russia, without evidence, told Western officials that Ukraine was preparing to use a “dirty bomb” on its own territory — a claim Kyiv has rejected.
Britain, France and the United States said Russia's unfounded claims that Ukraine plans to use a "dirty bomb" on its own territory are not true.
The U.K. Defense Ministry "refuted these claims" from Russian Defense Minister Sergei Shoigu, who said without evidence that Ukraine plans to use a dirty bomb.
